definitions.definition: A certain degree of similarity between the meaning (s) of several ( synonymous ) words or phrases . (See Usage notes below.)
A list or collection of synonyms, often compared and contrasted.
The use of synonyms to clarify or explain one's meaning.
A system of synonyms . (The addition of quotations indicative of this usage is being sought:)
The state of not being the name to be used, of being a synonym.
examples: In 1924 this name was reduced to synonymy .

definitions.definition: A group or list of synonyms.
examples: The synonymy of Tachina is extensive.
Descriptions are followed by a synonymy of the names that have been applied in the literature .

main_definition: ( semantics ) A certain degree of similarity between the meaning (s) of several ( synonymous ) words or phrases . (See Usage notes below.)
secondary_definitions: A list or collection of synonyms, often compared and contrasted.
( rhetoric ) The use of synonyms to clarify or explain one's meaning.
A system of synonyms . (The addition of quotations indicative of this usage is being sought:)
( taxonomy ) The state of not being the name to be used, of being a synonym.
( taxonomy , by extension ) A group or list of synonyms.
